item.title: Langroid: Harness LLMs with Multi-Agent Programming
item.author: pchalasani
item.description:
Langroid: Harness LLMs with Multi-Agent Programming

The LLM Opportunity

Given the remarkable abilities of recent Large Language Models (LLMs), thereis an unprecedented opportunity to build intelligent applications powered bythis transformative technology. The top question for any enterprise is: howbest to harness the power of LLMs for complex applications? For technical andpractical reasons, building LLM-powered applications is not as simple asthrowing a task at an LLM-system and expecting it to do it.
